Title: Back to One
Plot: Consumed by bloodlust, Vic finally gets the chance to avenge his friend's murder, despite Shane's pleas against it. Meanwhile, Ronnie is assigned by Claudette to help Dutch and Billings investigate a robbery homicide at a pharmacy.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
